title: Squeak the squirrel
creator_credit: Lester F. Beck and Churchill-Wexler Film Productions
brief_description: A baby squirrel is used in experiments to show how animals learn. He soon learns not to be afraid of people, finds how to get nuts out of glass tubes and out of boxes. He stuffs them in his cheek pouches and scurries off to hoard them in his nest.
